text.section:
Sec. 21-204. Curfew of juveniles.
It shall be unlawful and a violation of this article for any person under the age of seventeen (17) years to linger, stay, congregate, move about, wander, or stroll in any public or semi-public place in Miami-Dade County, either on foot or in or upon any conveyance or vehicle being driven or parked thereon, during curfew hours.
